card_text: Target 1 "Dual Avatar" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them, then if you destroyed a "Dual Avatar" Fusion Monster you control by this effect, you can apply 1 of these effects.$N●Draw 1 card.$N●Banish 1 card from your opponent's GY.$NYou can only activate 1 "Dual Avatar Defeating Evil" per turn.
